results.title: Effects of simvastatin treatment on oxidant/antioxidant state and ultrastructure of diabetic rat myocardium.
results.text_hl: In the @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic myocardium@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment partly attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Protein_Losing_Enteropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011504 @@@angiopathic@@@ and @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherogenic@@@ processes, detected by electron microscopy.
